EDITEDITEDIT:Are any of the two people above me comfortable with building outside military.

Sure, i can build rockets and planes.

1- what's that

2- link?

3- Yes

4- Leave that lone wolf stuff behind.

EDIT: Disregard 1 and 2

We NEED someone who builds oversized, Too bad Zekes isn't here. Comrade would also be a Kraken sent in both senses.

EDITEDIT: Zekes is just being really, really quiet.

EDITEDITEDIT:Are any of the two people above me comfortable with building outside military

EDITx4: Because seriously I don't want me and Script to take all the weight for most of it. One trick horses are amazing when it's the right time....but not much else.

Yup, I can definitely build non-combat vessels, since that's where I really started (SSTOs and such), and I actually only started going heavy with combat ships once I joined the forum.

EDIT: I just got accepted to a team with GregroxMun and Rune, you wanna join us Spartwo?

Edited June 13, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h

Yup, I can definitely build non-combat vessels, since that's where I really started (SSTOs and such), and I actually only started going heavy with combat ships once I joined the forum.

EDIT: I just got accepted to a team with GregroxMun and Rune, you wanna join us Spartwo?

It seems like you're lacking a rover addict.

Jhh

It seems like you're lacking a rover addict.

Jhh

Jhh?

So, you wanna join? (I'll have GregroxMun PM ya.)

Also, you got Skype?

Edited June 13, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h
I'm on mobile and I have to type a bunch of letters to work. Yes but as rune put it who's the throttle jockey?

I'm on mobile and I have to type a bunch of letters to work. Yes but as rune put it who's the throttle jockey?

I think Gregrox is the team lead, but I'll check. I'll be a pilot if need be, since I'm pretty good with aircraft.

That what you mean?

Edited June 13, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h

Throttle jockey-Pilot.

Also, I have skype but have no idea how it works.

Edited June 13, 2014 by Spartwo

Throttle jockey-Pilot.

Also, I have skype but have no idea how it works.

I'll help you out if you need me to. I think it's just for the text-chat on it.
I like to type more so. I can make sure I don't say anything wrong (like saying the same word 5 times until I pronounce it right)
WHAT IS THIS?! It sounds like fun
Check the stickies in the main forum thread. (General KSP Discussion)
Am I too specialized in military vehicles? I had a huge collection of over sized science vessels in 0.16.

I've actually built two buildings, (A restaurant and a museum with a wacky twist)

*Coughs* can i join then fun? ;(

Random post... THE K-2 MBT.

Each of the heat rounds are depleted uranium cored and fit the popular L-55 120 mm smooth bore main cannon. Their is also space for the optional active defense system and a slanted frontal armor section along with the provisions for a turret aiming system, which is under development. The cannon has demonstrated terminal velocities in excess of 500 m/s along with room for at least two rounds. Space for missiles and flotation devices is also built in.

The front two circular lights are also red non co2 based lasers.

Imgur album is currently completely broken.

Never worry about orbital invasions again.

SABOT MKI

Edited June 14, 2014 by andrew123

I've actually built two buildings, (A restaurant and a museum with a wacky twist)

*Coughs* can i join then fun? ;(

You probably should go and see if any teams are still recruiting! The main thread's in the General KSP Discussion subforum, and there's a link on that thread to an unofficial (but up-to-date) team roster/chart.
I'll be fine... all by myself... alone....

I'll be fine... all by myself... alone....

Trust me, there are still teams recruiting.

Take a look over here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83034-Kerbin-Cup-Unofficial-Team-Blog-for-Unofficial-Teams
Nah, i'll be fine, i still need to finish my ship.

Meanwhile at Britannia labs....

"Sir, the baby megalodon is resisting research."

Each of the heat rounds are depleted uranium cored and fit the popular L-55 120 mm smooth bore main cannon. Their is also space for the optional active defense system and a slanted frontal armor section along with the provisions for a turret aiming system, which is under development. ZOMG Big tank! Please note that a HEAT tank shell is propelled by (explosions). Your tank has a mass relay cannon.

But considering that your shell travels at such a high velocity I think that my Panthers are relatively safe as I cannot imagine how you would be able to get the gun down low enough to hit them

Can I please have a download? I wish to test this things armor against my new APBCHEAT shells.
I gave up on my tank, i still need to work out how to build effective ones.
That gun was elevated on purpose. The default firing angle is slightly downwards.
Does your tank lack depression? xP
@daemonCaptrix, you want to finish the ancient surface battle we started a while back?
I am still waiting to see who comes out on top.
